thread.title: Sun Princess arrives in Brisbane after another gastro outbreak - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Sun Princess arrives in Brisbane after another gastro outbreak - Yahoo7

author: Aap On February
title: Sun Princess arrives in Brisbane after another gastro outbreak - Yahoo7
text:
Share Sun Princess arrives in Brisbane after another gastro outbreak - Yahoo7 About 140 people are believed to have been struck down with norovirus aboard the cruise ship Sun Princess. Close Brisbane cruise ship docking after Norovirus outbreak UP NEXT VIDEO Brisbane cruise ship docking after Norovirus outbreak. Source: 7 News Brisbane cruise ship docking after Norovirus outbreak 
The 15-deck Princess Cruises vessel docked in Brisbane on Thursday morning after travelling from New Zealand, but patients were still to disembark. 
It is the second gastro outbreak aboard the Sun Princess in two weeks. About 140 people are believed to have been struck down with norovirus. Source: 7 News 
About 90 people became sick on a trip to Papua New Guinea in early February. 
One passenger, Kathryn Perrott, told the ABC she decided to fly home from Auckland rather than travel back with the ship because she was concerned about the growing outbreak. 
"We had cabins all around us being cleaned by people in hazmat suits, with people obviously sick," she said. 
Ms Perrott said the captain announced a spike in the virus over the ship's PA system. The 15-deck Princess Cruises vessel docked in Brisbane on Thursday morning after travelling from New Zealand, but patients were still to disembark. Source: 7 News Close Contagious virus sweeps through Sun Princess cruise ship UP NEXT VIDEO Contagious virus sweeps through Sun Princess cruise ship. Source: Seven News Contagious virus sweeps through Sun Princess cruise ship 
"We'd walk down the long corridor, go into our room and hear people throwing up as you're going down the corridor. It's not very pleasant," she said. 
In a statement the cruise line said, "Sun Princess has returned to Brisbane today following a 14-night cruise to New Zealand destinations." 
"While the risk of Norovirus is 750 times greater on land than at sea, when it happens on a cruise ship, already high sanitation levels are increased further including encouraging guests to regularly wash their hands with warm water and soap and to use hand sanitiser machines located on board. 
"Most guests on Sun Princessâ€™ just completed cruise were unaffected by illness. At no stage during the cruise was there a large number of guests ill at any one time. About 140 people are believed to have been struck down with norovirus aboard the cruise ship Sun Princess. Source: 7 News Close Sun Princess cruise leaves QLD with new passengers after contagious virus break-out UP NEXT VIDEO Sun Princess cruise leaves QLD with new passengers after contagious virus break-out. Source: Sunrise Perth Sun Princess cruise leaves QLD with new passengers after contagious virus break-out 
"Embarkation of guests has been delayed today to enable deep cleansing of the ship and the terminal. 
"Additional deep cleansing was also conducted on the previous cruise in Port Chalmers and Auckland. Guests have been advised of the changed arrangements for today's sailing on a 10-night cruise to the South Pacific." Close
